text:
hello guys! :wave:
does anyone know how to add media queries styles to every custom module that is going to be used in standard drag n drop editor?

asking because if I add it as a `<style>` tag inside the custom module itself, this is stripped by Gmail app and web client :disappointed:
thanks
not possible right now unfortunately :confused: This issue has kept us from implementing DND emails for most of our clients.
Why would we pay extra for Litmus if it's included in HS?
For the feature mentioned above. How much time would it save you to have that feature?
